title: MD
specialty: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine
biography: Harald zur Hausen NAS EASA APS was a German virologist. He carried out research on cervical cancer and discovered the role of papilloma viruses in cervical cancer, for which he received the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2008. He was chairman of the German Cancer Research Center in Heidelberg.
aiSummary: Harald zur Hausen is a nobel prize in physiology or medicine specialist with an H-index of 87 at German Cancer Research Center (DKFZ)Virology / Oncology (Member). Has been published in Nature reviews. Cancer, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
